#loading necessary packages
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
library(xml2)
library(dplyr)

#link to the website that has the songs sorted by album:
url <- "https://colorcodedlyrics.com/2015/10/01/seventeen-sebeuntin-lyrics-index/"



page <- GET(url)
# Parse the HTML
content <- read_html(page)

# Extracting all the links
links <- content %>%
  html_elements("a") %>%
  html_attr("href") %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  unique()

# Converting relative URLs to absolute:
absolute_links <- url_absolute(links, url)

#Save to CSV
write.csv(data.frame(links = absolute_links),
          "links.csv",
          row.names = FALSE)

# Choosing only links to the songs from albums of interest:
keep_patterns <- c("2015/06/seventeen-sebeuntin", "2020/06/", "2023/04", "2024/10/14", "adore")
patterns <- paste(keep_patterns, collapse = "|")

filtered_links <- absolute_links[
  grepl(patterns, absolute_links) & 
    !grepl("japanese|taeyang|wen|dk|vocal-team", absolute_links)
  ]
print(filtered_links)

#Save to CSV
write.csv(data.frame(links = filtered_links),
          "links.csv",
          row.names = FALSE)
